title: Sins of the Daughter
description: New York’s two Godfathers – dead. A grieving daughter – eyes set on taking over.New York’s Mafia families are in a state of near-anarchy. Petty gangs are attempting to solidify their grip on the city’s criminal enterprises.Jessica, the pride of her father, Don Lombardi, has returned from Italy after the bloodshed and hasn’t forgotten the Omerta. New to holding the reins of power, Jessica finds that the gangs, old-time mobsters, and the NYPD are equally relentless.Aligning herself with her mother-in-law, Sofia Giuliani, Jessica is moving at breakneck speeds to pull everyone together before the families fracture completely.Will she be the New York underworld’s overlord...or ruin?
author: Frank Lucianus
